description: This file initializes the database package by exposing key interfaces for configuration, session management, and tenant context of a manufacturing cloud application. It imports core components and registers models with SQLAlchemy.

classes.name: Base
classes.description: SQLAlchemy declarative base class for database models.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Configuration settings class for database and application setup.

methods.name: get_engine
methods.description: Create or retrieve the SQLAlchemy engine instance.

methods.name: get_async_session
methods.description: Get an asynchronous database session for transactions.

methods.name: set_current_tenant
methods.description: Set the current tenant context for multi-tenant data separation.

methods.name: tenant_context
methods.description: Context manager for tenant-specific database operations.

calls: from .session import get_engine, get_async_session, set_current_tenant, tenant_context

ctags.name: models
ctags.pattern: /^from . import models as models  # noqa: F401$/
